p: MDCK‐S cells were cultured in 500‐mL disposable spinner flasks (Corning, Corning, NY, USA) with 100 mL of chemically defined medium (CDM) at 37°C, 5% CO 2, and 100 rpm on a shaking platform (MIR‐S100C; Sanyo, Osaka, Japan). MDCK‐A and LLC‐MK2D cells were subcultured in MEM supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) in a 75‐cm 2 culture flask at 37°C under 5% CO 2.
